Class Accounts

java.lang.Object
Accounts
public class Accounts extends Object
Accounts manages user data management, including the creation, modification, and deletion of stored users. It interacts with the Authentication class to securely handle user information and verification.
Since:
2025-11-06

  • Constructor Details

    • Accounts

      public Accounts()
      Constructs a new Accounts object. This default constructor initializes the Accounts class (no parameters).

  • Method Details

    • registerUser

      public boolean registerUser(String username, String password)
      Registers a new user account.
      Parameters:
      username - the new user's desired username
      password - the chosen password
      Returns:
      true if registration is successful, false otherwise

    • signIn

      public boolean signIn(String username, String password)
      Signs in a user by verifying the username and password credentials.
      Parameters:
      username - the username entered by the user
      password - the password entered by the user
      Returns:
      true if sign-in is successful, false otherwise

    • signOut

      public boolean signOut()
      Sign out the currently active user and clears their session data.
      Returns:
      true if sign-out was successful, false otherwise

    • changePassword

      public boolean changePassword(String username, String oldPassword, String newPassword)
      Change the user’s password after verifying the old password.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the account
      oldPassword - the current password
      newPassword - the new password to set
      Returns:
      true if the password was successfully changed, false otherwise

    • resetPassword

      public boolean resetPassword(String username, String newPassword)
      Resets a password using a verified secret answer.
      Parameters:
      username - the username associated with the account
      newPassword - the new password to set
      Returns:
      true if the password is successfully reset, false otherwise

    • setSecretQuestionAndAnswer

      public boolean setSecretQuestionAndAnswer(String username, String question, String answer)
      Allows users to set or update their secret question and answer. for password recovery.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the account
      question - the selected secret question
      answer - the secret answer for the question selected
      Returns:
      true if both the question and answer were saved successfully, or false otherwise.

    • getSecretQuestion

      public String getSecretQuestion(String username)
      Retrieves the stored secret question for the given username during password recovery.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the account
      Returns:
      the stored secret question, or null if none exists.

    • verifySecretAnswer

      public boolean verifySecretAnswer(String username, String answer)
      Checks if the user’s provided secret answer matches the stored recovery answer.
      Parameters:
      username - the username associated with the account
      answer - the provided secret answer
      Returns:
      true if the secret answer matches the stored one, false otherwise

    • checkInvalidCredentials

      public boolean checkInvalidCredentials(String username, String password)
      Detects invalid login attempts, such as incorrect usernames or passwords.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the account.
      password - the password entered by the user
      Returns:
      true if credentials are invalid, or false otherwise.

    • isDuplicateUsername

      public boolean isDuplicateUsername(String username)
      Checks if a username already exists in the system. Avoids making twice of the same account.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the account.
      Returns:
      true if the username is already taken, false otherwise

    • checkEdgeCases

      public boolean checkEdgeCases(String username, String password)
      Identifies unusual or invalid input edge cases such as excessive symbols, whitespace, or invalid characters.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the account
      password - the password to test
      Returns:
      true if an edge case is detected, or false otherwise.

    • checkIncompleteForm

      public boolean checkIncompleteForm(String username, String password)
      Checks whether all required input fields in a registration or login form are properly filled.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the account
      password - the password entered by the user
      Returns:
      true if one or more fields are incomplete, or false otherwise.

    • deleteUser

      public boolean deleteUser(String username)
      Removes a user account and all associated records from the system.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the account
      Returns:
      true if the deletion is successful, or false otherwise
